Package model.bet

Interface Bet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Bet>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColorBet, NumberBet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorBetImpl, NumberBetImpl
    public interface Bet
extends java.lang.Comparable<Bet>
    Represents a bet in the Game Engine in Further Programming Assignment. This interface is extended by ColorBet and NumberBet. You're encouraged to think about the common functionality that exists between them.

    This interface extends Comparable to allow Bets (specifically their amounts) to be compared.

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    BetType, ColorBet, NumberBet, Comparable

      • isWinningBet

        boolean isWinningBet​(Slot slot)
        Returns a boolean true or false if the bet is a winning bet or not based on the supplied slot parameter.

        eg. True if the betType is BetType.BLACK and the slots color is SlotColor.BLACK

        Parameters:
        slot - the winning (final) slot
        Returns:
        true if the bet wins WRT the supplied slot; otherwise false.
        See Also:
        BetType, BetType.isWinningBet(Slot), SlotColor

      • getOutcome

        int getOutcome​(Slot slot)
        Returns the outcome of the bet based on the supplied slot parameter.

        If the bet is a winning bet then the outcome will be a positive number based on the bet amount and the odds appropriate for the bet type. Otherwise the outcome will be a negative of the magnitude of the bet amount. Only NO_BET (declared below) should return an outcome of 0.

        Parameters:
        slot - the winning slot
        Returns:
        the outcome of the bet
        See Also:
        isWinningBet(Slot), BetType, BetType.getMultiplier()

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Override Object.toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representing the bet as seen in the output trace
